title: Billing Issue
complaint_description: Customer was charged incorrectly: charged $45.00 for order total $495.00.
resolution_steps: Acknowledge message and apologize for inconvenience.
Request any required proof (photos, order number).
If duplicate charge, reverse duplicate immediately and notify bank.
Confirm with customer when resolution completed and close the ticket.
agent_notes: Assigned to support agent #6344. Follow-up in 24-48 hours.
